column1: Art Institute of Chicago////First of all
column2: how many art museums can you go to and feel like Ferris Bueller and company?  That is cool enough for me.  But
column3: they have an excellent modern art exhibit including a ginormous Warhol that leaves me happy every time I see it.  Since they always have a new exhibit
column4: going here never gets old and tiring.  And
column6: they have a discount for Chicago residents!
